scripts.install: npm i opusscript@latest node-opus@latest body-parser@latest discord.js@latest dotenv@latest express@latest fs@latest ffmpeg-stream@latest is-url@latest moment@latest mongoose@latest sourcebin@latest string-placeholder@latest ytdl-core@latest ytpl@latest ytsr@latest ent@latest sec2human@latest m3u8stream@latest child_process@latest @discordjs/voice@latest tweetnacl@latest topgg-autoposter@latest systeminformation@latest short-uuid@latest discord-api-types@latest @discordjs/rest@latest zlib-sync@latest erlpack@latest
